text_4: Walk forward and take a high shot
text_5: Now take a shot from the ground
text_6: When you beat off an opponent's punches, a special technique scale accumulates. As soon as he's ready, you can hit the super ball
text_7: If the opponent uses a super technique, have time to hit the ball in time, you will have 1 attempt
text_8: This completes training, and match can begin, move to the marked area
